author: geirm
msg: Migration from the o.a.v.context package (where it didn't belong, but was
there bacause I didn't have to think about context and protection issues)

author: geirm
msg: Reworked the context interface stuff to enable to movement of the event
stuff out, making event support for a custom context optional, and
keeping the internal stuff internal - so only Event interface is
publicly accessable.  I think this is right :)
InternalContextAdapterImpl : added support for IEC as optional
InternalContextBase.java : added inclusion and implementaion of
as now in it's own interface.
VMContext.java : needed import statment as EC is now in different package

author: geirm
msg: newline at end - who know what problems that might cause for someone

author: geirm
msg: Added a loadConfiguration() override to set the template path and
log file relative to webapp root
